title: Sound of Bronze (sound of silence parody)
body:
Hello feeder my old friend,
I've come to talk with you again,
because a vision softly creeping,
left its seeds while i was playing,
and the vision, that was planted in my brain,
still remains, whitin the sound of the announcer.

In restless rankeds I played alone,
troll picks made by people bronze.
And 'neath the hope of a promo,
I turned my picks to the noob champs,
when my team fed, to the enemy middle lane,
that split the hope, and touched the sound of losing.

And in the bronze 4 I saw,
ten thousand people, maybe more.
People farming without fighting,
people dying without smiting,
people diving towers at 50 hitpoints or less,
and no one dare, disturb the sound of feeding.

"Fools" said I, "You do not know,
trolling like a cancer grows.
Hear my words that I might teach you,
accept my invite that I might boost you."
But my words like silent raindrops fell,
and echoed, in the wells of bronze 5.

And the people bowed and prayed,
to the silver god they made.
And the silver flashed out its warning,
in the picks it was taking.
And the silver said, "Zilean jungle always works
it's written on the online boards,
and reddit posts."
And whisper'd in the sounds of unrankeds.

replies.body:
Mi piacciono ste cose, +1.
Spero di esser stato complice scriven: "{{champion:37}} - sound of silence" (abbastanza cattiva direi)

Comunque proporrei una rubrica, ci metto il mio:

> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Crm94eMuPE
> 
> Mai, mai, scorderai
> il "First blood"
> il feeding che iniziò
> 
> La chat
> s'infiammò
> e poi
> "report!"
> 
> E la black cleaver
> con il last whisper
> sulla tua top
> senza pietà
> 
> Chi, mai, fermerà
> la sua
> Kill streak
> 
> Chi, mai, carriera
> i nostri
> bronzini
> 
> Chi da questo
> Low hell
> ci solleverà
> chi mai potrà!?
> 
> Ken sei tu
> fantastico guerriero
> tippato come Peke al loro Nexus
> 
> Ken sei tu
> il nostro solo carry
> e nessuna lane adesso è persa
> 
> Ken sei
> il feedato
> l'unico
> l'unico full build
> 
> Ken sei
> davvero OP
> col red
> e il quinto drake
> 
> Partita in promo
> anche per me
> nel teamfight vai!
> 
> Ken, sei tu
> con la bork tua più forte
> tu che hai fermato anche riven
> 
> Ken, sei tu
> lo smurf fra i due team
> tu la mia speranza nel gold-five
> 
> 
> 
> Mai, mai, scorderai
> l'early game, la torre persa in top
> 
> Mai, mai, tu vedrai
> mirror lane, che vinci
> 
> Coach coreano
> coach su di noi
> guerriero vai!
